original_text: When Joshua heard the noise of the people shouting, he said to Moses, “There is the sound of war in the camp.”
korean_text: 여호수아가 백성들의 요란한 소리를 듣고 모세에게 말하되 진중에서 싸우는 소리가 나나이다

sentences.original_text: When Joshua heard the noise of the people shouting
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 백성들이 외치는 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: There is the sound of war in the camp
